folder: Purdy Place & Seguine Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text: (1) Purdy Place, at the N. E. corner of Seguine Avenue, showing Purdy's Hotel. The house was built in 1690 (see Robinson's 1898 and 1907 maps).. November 25, 1922 By William T. Davis through P. L. Sperr  (2) The same, at a later date. Purdy Place is on the right. P. L. Sperr  1924 (3) A view from Seguine Avenue. P. L. Sperr  May 14, 1932

Purdy Place, at the N.E. corner of Seguine Avenue, showing Purdy's Hotel. The house was built in 1690 (see Robinson's 1898 and 1907 maps).
